snippet.title: Utility for the Soul - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Utility for the Soul is a meditative interactive puzzle experience based on Lithuanian-American environment artist Aleksandra Kasuba’s concept for what she called the Retreat House. It was intended to be a unique, utopian facility for use by large corporations to give overworked employees a fresh perspective and rejuvenate them.

More information - https://utilityforthesoul.com
Download on iOS - https://apps.apple.com/lt/app/utility-for-the-soul/id1541463045
Download on Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.WeekendWarriors.utilityforthesoul
Download on Windows and MAC - https://lndm.itch.io/utility-for-the-soul
